mapper.insert: INSERT INTO email_templates (id, tenant_id, template_name, category, subject, body, placeholders, created_at, version) VALUES (#{id}, #{tenantId}, #{templateName}, #{category}, #{subject}, #{body}, #{placeholders}, #{createdAt}, #{version})
mapper.update: UPDATE email_templates SET template_name = #{templateName}, category = #{category}, subject = #{subject}, body = #{body}, placeholders = #{placeholders}, updated_at = #{updatedAt}, deleted_at = #{deletedAt}, version = version + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND version = #{version}
mapper.delete: UPDATE email_templates SET deleted_at = UNIX_TIMESTAMP(now(3)) * 1000 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted_at = 0
